response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled value and performance. Considering its worth to us and its significance to you, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive rate. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
